language-redownload: Updating the language does not redownload cards.

title.text_will_be_search_in_fields: The entered text will be searched in the following fields

delete_all_packs.title: Delete all packs
delete_all_packs.content:
Are you sure you want to delete all packs?

This will delete all cards from your browser.

download_all_packs.title: Download all packs
download_all_packs.content:
Are you sure you want to download all the packs?

This will download all the cards from MarvelCDB to your browser.

Execute this action as little as possible to avoid saturating the website.
